strapiPost.title: Exciting Additions Coming To NWA Nature Center
strapiPost.content:
The J.B. and Johnelle Hunt Family Ozark Highlands Nature Center in Springdale is a fantastic place for kids to learn about and engage with the outdoors, and soon there will be even more to enjoy. 

  • Playground: A 4,200 sq. ft. outdoor activity area will feature six stations including a boulder cavern, a cargo net climbing platform, and log climbing stations. Natural State Treehouses is constructing the project with locally-sourced rock and timber. 
  • Quail habitat: An enclosure is being constructed to house more than 20 northern bobwhites for educational purposes, helping kids witness the near threatened birds and learn about preservation. 

Learn more about the project HERE.
